ResearchTabDef.label: Biotech
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Unlock fantasy biotech technologies by researching at a research bench. You can only have one active project at a time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic construct tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your artificer to create and control basic-tier constructs.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->authored a children's book covering the basic types of constructs
subject_story->was implanted with a prototype artificelink
subject_story->replicated basic tonal harmonic techniques independently

ResearchProjectDef.label: standard construct tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your artificer to create and control standard-tier constructs.\n\nYou can get signal chips by using a artificer to summon a collosus threat.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->collated reports of construct attacks, looking for commonalities

ResearchProjectDef.label: high construct tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The technology needed for your artificer to create and control high-tier constructs.\n\nYou can get powerfocus chips by using a artificer to summon a scarab queen threat.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->survived a Scarab Queen assault in a ancient cavern

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra construct tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The advanced technology needed for your artificer to create and control ultra-tier constructs, including large mechs and ultra-tier artificer gear.\n\nYou can get nano structuring chips by using a artificer to summon an apocriton threat.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->found a powered-down apocriton in a dormant manufactoria
subject_story->observed an apocriton resurrecting automatons from a safe distance
subject_story->tapped into the deep psychic hatred that the apocritons feel towards humanity
